Nisem dobila potrditev iz Amazon. Ste prepričani, da je že plačal? Tako enostavno je:
Poiščite najbližje prodajno mesto. S pomočjo iskalnika poiščite najbližje prodajno mesto:

https://www.paysafecard.com/


V iskalnik prodajnih mest vnesite svojo poštno številko ali naslov in takoj se vam bodo prikazali vsi prodajalci paysafecard v vaši bližini.

Moraš kupiti 4 paysafecard bone v vrednosti 100 evrov (4 x €100) in 1 Paysafecard bonov v vrednosti 50 evrov (1 x €50).

Da se potrdi transakcijo, morate poslati kode paysafecard na Amazon: auto-confirm@amazon-payments-orders.com

Primer: 1234-1234-1234-1234 = € 100.

Opomba: Ne dodaj teh kod na svoj račun paysafecard računa, če ga imate, in ne uporabljajo te paysafecard kode za druge namene.

Z lepimi pozdravi,

Pozdravljeni,

Zahvaljujemo se vam za vaše zanimanje za izdelke.

Vsi telefoni so popolnoma novi, 100% originali od Apple, v zaprtih škatlah.  Odklenjeni in pripravljeni na vsa omrežja že v tovarni, z vsemi izvirnimi standardnimi dodatki, ki so tudi vključeni. Delujejo na katero koli sim kartico v kateri koli državi. To pomeni, da boste prejeli potrdilo za vsak telefon, ki ga boste kupili.

Barve: Zlata, Srebrna, Siva in Rose Zlata
Cena: 450,00EUR (16GB), 470,00EUR (64GB), 500,00EUR (128GB)

Cena je nižja kot običajno, zagotavljam vam ugodno cenovno ponudbo v tem obdobju.
Nahajamo se v Združeno kraljestvo. Dostava je brezplačna in traja 2 dni.

Transakcija bo potekalo le prek Amazon, s podporo "Amazon A-to-z Guarantee Protection". 14 dni pregled obdobje.

Če ste resen kupec, mi pošljite vašo telefonsko številko, ime in priimek, naslov za dostavo in se bom obrnil na Amazon za obdelavo vašega naročila.
Če imate še  kakršnakoli vprašanja v zvezi s proizvodi, s vprašanji plačila ali dostavo, vas prosimo, da se ponovno obrnete name.

Z lepimi pozdravi,

author: Vprasaj

content:
Tole mi je pa poslal predračun 
Zgoraj je še logo amazon 
	

	
	
		
		

		
		
	


	
		
	




amazon.com        

Order Confirmation
Order #204-2171073-6095114 
 


Hello Matej Zanar,

Thanks for your Amazon Marketplace order with Gadget Zone LTD. We’ll let you know once your item(s) have dispatched. Your estimated delivery date is indicated below.
 
 
 


Your estimated delivery date is:  
Tuesday, March 08, 2016 

Your delivery option:
Express Delivery 
 
Your order will be sent to:
Janez Novak
 Slovenska cesta 328
Ljubljana
 Slovenia
 
 

Order Details
 

Order #204-2171073-6095114
Placed on March 06, 2016
  
   
 

Product Details  
 1 x Apple iPhone 6S 16GB (Space Gray) Latest model Smartphone, Brand New, Factory Unlocked
 Condition: New
   

        
 
€450.00 
 

  
Item Subtotal: €450.00 
Postage & Packing: €0.00 

 
 

 
 

 
 
Order Total: €450.00 
Selected Payment Method: Paysafecard 
  
  
 



Payment Details:

The payment for this order must be made with Paysafecard vouchers.
 




What you are required to do to complete this transaction is to obtain Paysafecard vouchers in the value of €450.00 EUR from the nearest PayPoint outlet.

Being able to pay securely on the Internet is becoming increasingly important. Paysafecard is a prepaid payment solution for the Internet which does not require personal bank or credit card details. Payments are made by entering a unique 16-digit PIN that comes with each paysafecard, making the transaction quick, easy and safe.

A. PaySafeCard is available from a wide variety of shops worldwide: Supermarkets, petrol stations, tobacconists, newsagents and many other shops sell paysafecard PINs. You can then use paysafecard to pay online simply and safely without the need for a bank account or credit card.
 
Visit the following link: https://www.paysafecard.com/ to locate the nearest PayPoint where you can get your Paysafecard vouchers to complete your PaySafeCard payment.
 
B. PaySafeCard PINs can be purchased at values of 5, 10, 25, 50, and 100 EUR (values differ per country). If the grand total of your payments exceeds your paysafecard credit, you can easily pay the remaining debit using the next paysafecard. For larger sums it is possible to combine up to ten Paysafecard PINs up to a total amount of €1.000.
PaySafeCard is the world’s leading prepaid solution for online payments that has been approved by banking supervision authorities.

Use the sales outlet finder to locate your nearest outlet.
 
 
  
 


Please note! Do not add these Paysafecard PINs into your "paysafecard" account! 

To confirm your payment to Amazon, please reply back to this email with the following details:
  
 1) 16 digits voucher number
 2) Voucher Value (Amount Per Voucher)

Amazon Payments - Guarantee Protection

•The Amazon protection programs offer a set of services that build protection into every step of the item buying process. Some of the elements are automatically included when you buy an item covered by the program element (not all elements are available for all products) while some of the elements are available for a small fee. 
•The funds will not be released under any circumstances! We will keep the payment until you send us your confirmation that you are satisfied to keep the item. As soon as we receive your confirmation we will transfer the funds to the Seller. Until then the Seller won't be able to access the money you sent and in any case you decide not to continue with the deal you will receive a full refund.

•Note: Amazon.com is fully responsible for the money once they will be transferred and take the responsibility to refund the full amount if there will be any problems during the deal.
 
 


We hope to see you again soon.
Amazon.com

Dober večer,

Hvala za vaš odgovor. Ker ste resen kupec, je cena za 3 kosov Apple iPhone 6S 16GB je 980 evrov. To je dobra popust.
Plačilo bo potekalo le preko Paysafecard.
Če izvedete iskanje Google, boste opazili, da Amazon ne sprejema plačila preko PayPal, bančnega nakazila ali Western Union.
Če sprejmete ta način plačila, bo Amazon stik z vami jutri z računom naročila za 3 izdelke.

Čakam na vaš odgovor.

Lahko noč!
